00200   int retval = -1;
00201   jbyteArray byteArray = 0;
00202

00204   {
00205     URLProtocolHandler_CheckException(env);
00206     byteArray = env->NewByteArray(size);
00207     URLProtocolHandler_CheckException(env);
00208     // read into the Java byte array
00209     if (byteArray)
00210     {
00211       retval = env->CallIntMethod(mJavaProtoHandler, mJavaUrlRead_mid,
00212           byteArray, size);
00213       URLProtocolHandler_CheckException(env);
00214     }
00215     // now, copy into the C array, but only up to retval.
00216     if (retval > 0)
00217     {
00218       env->GetByteArrayRegion(byteArray, 0, retval, (jbyte*)buf);
00219       URLProtocolHandler_CheckException(env);
00220     }
00221   }

00223   {

00233   // is not returning to Java soon.
